#load and tidy the pups dataset
```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
pups_data = read_csv("./data/FAS_pups.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  gather(key = pd_outcome, value = pd, pd_ears:pd_walk) %>%
  separate(pd_outcome, into = c("remove", "pd_outcome"), sep = "_") %>%
  select(-remove) %>%
  mutate(sex = recode(sex, `1` = "male", `2` = "female")) 

```
